title: Ticket #5607: condor_gangliad fails to parse usernames with periods
description:
The bulk of LIGO usernames include periods separating first and last name (we call them albert.einstein names). All new LIGO usernames are in this format.

People argued about the period. It's here. We also have dashes. Mostly for Europeans, e.g.

laura.van-der-schaaf

These names don't get correctly reported by condor_gangliad. The above appears as, for example, "laura Total Running Jobs" under the HTCondor.Accounting.Groups metrics of the collector/negotiator.

For starters, we are not using accounting groups so I'm not sure it should be reported. But if so, it should be accurate.

The section HTCondor.Submitters accurately reports the name above as laura.van-der-schaaf@nemo.phys.uwm.edu
